JobFullDesc: Join us as we take Microsoft Teams, our fast-growing collaboration product, to the next level. Our office in Prague is expanding and we are seeking a motivated Program Manager/Release Manager.  In this role, you will work closely with our Teams Meetings engineering teams to coordinate release plans and ensure engineering lifecycle milestones are completed on time, with quality. You will leverage data to help the team make decisions about project health, and regularly communicate status to project and release stakeholders. This role will have direct exposure to leadership and the benefit of working with a great team of engineers and program managers who are equally committed to delivering innovative solutions for our customers. You will have the opportunity to define process efficiency solutions and drive adoption across the organization.   The successful candidate will exhibit these attributes that will enhance their ability to succeed: Ensure effective communication; verbal and written Strong project management skills Good understanding of the importance to have cross-group and cross-cultural collaboration  Organization excellence, with the ability to manage and prioritize work against multiple deadlines  Desire to motivate and support the success of others  Ability to thrive in a fast paced and dynamic environment is essential  What is it like working on Microsoft Teams? We are in a fast-moving environment that lets us explore, iterate and deliver value to customers. Our culture is inclusive, respectful and empowering. Our PMs, Engineers and Designers come from diverse backgrounds and provide opportunities to learn and grow together. We share an immense passion for the customer and user experiences that surprise and delight the people that use them. We are also a team that likes to have fun, and we build that attitude into how we work and what we create. ResponsibilitiesDefine or evolve existing frameworks for software development planning, execution and release activities Track and report on the completion of milestones and deliverables. Drive regular project/shiproom meetings and ensure issues, action items and risks are tracked and have mitigation and resolution plans in place  Provide status updates to stakeholders Work closely with other Release Managers to align release activities across the portfolio Build and maintain project health dashboards and provide awareness with respect to project health and key engineering metrics Help bridge the gap across project stakeholders and dependencies QualificationsBS/BA degree in Computer Science, Computer Information Systems or related field preferred but not required. Extended experience working on Software Program, Project Management/Release Management or demonstrated capabilities to perform responsibilities.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.  We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form. Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
